articles.content:
HOLLYWOOD star Kevin Spacey pinned a theatre worker to a desk and grinded on him until he screamed: Get off me!, a court heard yesterday.

articles.title: Ellerby: Gold coins found hidden under kitchen floor sell for £754,000 - bbc.co.uk
articles.description: The coins, found during kitchen renovations in East Yorkshire, have attracted global interest.
articles.content:
A treasure trove of more than 260 gold coins discovered by a couple beneath their kitchen floor during renovations has sold for £754,000 at auction.

articles.title: Edinburgh’s film festival changed culture. Its closure is a serious loss to cinema - The Guardian
articles.description: Global film greats flocked to the festival because of its dedication to the art – and because they know great pictures are nothing without great picturehouses
articles.content: I remember the shock when Alfred Hitchcock died. For film fans in Edinburgh, Scotland and further afield, Thursday was a similar body blow. The citys great cultural cinema, Filmhouse, and its august … [+3647 chars]
